messages.messageContent: Was the standby unit activated? CENSORED wants to know
Yes
Yes, we heard them talking outside the house
Activated
Keep yourselves and your family safe 🙏🏻
Sending a big hug to everything ❤️
Lock the safe rooms
Handle up
Don't open for anyone ❤️
Can someone say something reassuring and tell us that there are soldiers in the kibbutz and not terrorists 😨
There are terrorists
Don’t open the door to anyone who looks like a soldier
They’re dressed like soldiers
Hold safe room doors

Hello dears
TThere’s a lot of pressure and fear here, mostly on my end. I would appreciate it if people won’t share more information than needed.

Agree with CENSORED, and please don’t mention names/addresses/neighborhoods.
Not everyone can handle this information well.

It’s not over yet. Make sure to keep your doors locked.
We’ve kept contact with MDA over the past couple of hours, but they still haven’t sent any ambulances.
We'll keep you posted
Don’t mention any names on WhatsApp!!!!
The messaging system isn't working, CENSORED occasionally sends updates to the kibbutz members’ distribution list.I’ll share them here for anyone who isn’t on it.
The army will soon start searching house to house. Identify yourself only if you hear someone saying 13, 13. Otherwise, don’t answer at all!

Pay attention,
Don’t open the door to anyone saying that they’re police or a standby unit.
Only if they say 13, 13, or identify as the Duvdevan Unit.
The IDF is planning an airstrike on the settlement. They’re asking us to notify all residents to remain in their safe rooms...
The Duvdevan Unit entered the kibbutz, and they passed by our house

We're in the safe room
Did anyone hear someone knocking on our door?😞
I think they’re going to break down our door… we’re going through the same thing…
All the doors are locked
Has anyone heard from CENSORED?????
Has anyone heard from CENSORED??
Is there anyone who can call me and help me calm down?
The IDF is firing from the air inside the kibbutz. Everyone, please get into your safe rooms now
CENSORED and CENSORED have lived there for less than a year. Their house is right by the fence
I’m trying to contact them. Does anyone know them?
Anyone?
There are reports of announcements telling people to come out with their hands up… don’t listen to them.
The IDF is starting to evacuate us. They’ll knock on your door and announce themselves. Wait patiently.
And what about those of us who can’t hear anything from our safe rooms
Wait and hope. We’ve been in the safe room, nearly suffocating, with a 3-month-old
They broke my door down and came into the house
What does the IDF say when they come to evacuate us? How will we know it’s them? Do they just break in?

They say IDF IDF
Ask what unit
They say the name of the unit
In our case, a neighbor came in shouting that it was all right
Where are they evacuating us to?
Please come to the houses by the pool please
Begging you!!!
Terrorists in our house
Please help
Stop please they’re in the row of houses in front of us
They claim they’re IDF
Can CENSORED verify?
Can they please go by the pool pleaseeeeee
Air strike planned in the kibbutz area

How can this still be going on???
Where is the IDF? 
Why aren’t they flying in all the special forces and battalions from across the country to Kfar Aza???
Has anyone heard from CENSORED
Questions we're all asking
Is there any way to contact CENSORED? Their family is worried
Has anyone heard anything from my parents? CENSORED?...
Any information about CENSORED?
Is there someone coordinating the list of evacuees?
CENSORED is in the rightmost house. I can't locate the house number
In the Youth neighborhood

What about CENSORED? Has anyone heard anything?
What about CENSORED?
What about CENSORED ??
Please, does anyone know anything about what’s going on in the Youth neighborhood

CENSORED
What’s going on in the Youth neighborhood????
Please what’s happening in the Youth neighborhood????????????
Still don't know anything
Don’t go anywhere near Road 4 if you’re leaving the area 🙏🏼
Please ask them to go to the Youth gen neighborhood!!!! They’re there!!!!!
CENSORED does anyone know if she’s okay?
I saw her in Hodaya early morning
She and her whole family were evacuated from the kibbutz

I'm here CENSORED
We were evacuated early morning CENSORED
Does anyone know if CENSORED my brother got on a bus
He was evacuated but isn’t reachable
He's on it

SWAT team in Young Generation neighborhood going from house to house 
CENSORED
Yessssss
CENSORED!!!!!!!! Please, she’s in the Youth neighborhood
Please let them take care of that neighborhood
